p: These results state the effectiveness of encapsulation of EOs into nanoliposomes to increase the antifungal activity against T. rubrum strains. Remarkably, it is interesting that even at the lowest concentrations of EO (0.25 µL/mL), the inhibition (28.13 ± 1.72%) values were higher than the control nanoliposomes (20.9 ± 1.51%) encapsulated into nanoliposomes, and there was an increase in %MGI in all the formulations compared to the EOs in bulk.
